channel.title: Softlayer_network_storage_schedule on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_storage_schedule on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule Service Datatype Description Schedules can be created for select Storage services, such as iscsi. These schedules are used to perform various tasks such as scheduling snapshots or synchronizing replicants. The schedule service can be used to create, edit, or delete a schedule. Schedules are defined by the properties associated with them to specify values such as the start date, interval, or end date of the schedule.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule Datatype Description Schedules can be created for select Storage services, such as iscsi. These schedules are used to perform various tasks such as scheduling snapshots or synchronizing replicants. Local active A flag which determines if a schedule is active. Type: integer createDate The date a schedule was created. Type: dateTime id A schedule's internal identifier. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule

Type: integer createDate The date a schedule was created. Type: dateTime id A schedule's internal identifier. Type: integer

item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule::createObject Overview Create a nas volume schedule Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule object that you wish to create. templateObject SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule object that you wish to create. Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Network_Storage_ScheduleObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule

item.title: deleteObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule::deleteObject Overview Delete a network storage schedule. “‘This cannot be undone.”’ “deleteObject” returns Boolean “true” on successful deletion or “false” if it was unable to remove a schedule; Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Network_Storage_ScheduleInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule::editObject Overview Edit a nas volume schedule Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule A skeleton SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule object with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Network_Storage_ScheduleInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean
